title: What is the font used in a book
content:
Hi, this is my first post. I'm typesetting my first book, and after a month of looking through books, this one really jumped out at me and I love the way it looks on the page. It's a scan of the page so its not that great an image. Even something similar would be great. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018101545im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeupload_3454.gif)
author: blixen
